text: Bɨ Ebel ne God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, tap teplep dad apɨl God nop pak sɨbog ñak. Pak sɨbog ñek God nɨgek tep gak ak pen, nɨmam Kein tap dad apɨl God nop sɨbog ñek God nɨgek tep ma gak. Ebel God nop gos lɨnɨgak ak nɨm, nop pen bɨ suŋtep yad agɨl, tap sɨbog ñak ak nɨŋɨd, yɨp tep gup agak. Ebel kumɨl amek, mɨñɨl ayɨp ma mɨdobun ak pen, ne God nop gos lɨnɨgak kesɨm anɨb ak, chɨnop gos ñɨlɨg yɨbɨl mɨdeb.
